title: Businesses Have a Big Idea to Tackle AI: More Task Forces
description: Companies create committees and teams to seize on the potential of artificial intelligence as executives debate how best to handle the technology.

title: Canada Woos American H-1B Visa Holders Fed Up with U.S. Immigration System
description: A move to start offering work permits to foreigners on U.S. H-1B visas seizes on the frustrations of many in the tech industry who are stuck in U.S. immigration limbo.

title: Can Tracking Your Moods Make You Happier?
description: Apple is pushing into mental health with an emotion gauge for iPhone and Apple Watch.

title: Here's How Twitter Could Become Irrelevant
description: Threads has many, distinct qualities that make it the first credible threat

title: FTC Loses Latest Bid to Halt Microsoft-Activision Merger
description: An appeals court ruling clears a path for the $75 billion acquisition to close while litigation continues.
